channel.title: What will be of us?
channel.description: I didnt think this would go in the rs section, because im talking about private servers, eh, anyways, with the free trade enabled and pking, what will become of us private servers?? Wont we die out? I mean when jagex releases retarded updates, thats a win win for us, because more people play private servers, but when they release a good update like this, then we just may loose all players!

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:11, topic:377255”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=473161.msg3460323#msg3460323 date=1294428516]
Correct me if I am wrong but I’m pretty sure that this site was made when the wilderness still existed, and was at its peak when it still existed, so I do not think anything will happen. PK’ing is only one of the traits that private servers have.
[/quote]
Take into consideration everything was so much harder back in 06/07. There was no such thing as a 20m drop, let alone a 500m drop.

This site will slowly die, it’s going to happen. The only thing that would save it would be an official server to unite the userbase. No more default hybrid etc.[/quote]

Agreed completely.

This site has already started to die, and especially with this community not very interested in RSPS (we are based on it, yes, but look around at the topics, there are no advancements).

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @flj0yter0p flj0yter0p
item.description:
@flj0yter0p wrote:

The people that can’t afford membership on runescape and want to enjoy partyhats and full bandos will stay.

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Si Force:

Correct me if I am wrong but I’m pretty sure that this site was made when the wilderness still existed, and was at its peak when it still existed, so I do not think anything will happen. PK’ing is only one of the traits that private servers have.

Take into consideration everything was so much harder back in 06/07. There was no such thing as a 20m drop, let alone a 500m drop.

This site will slowly die, it’s going to happen. The only thing that would save it would be an official server to unite the userbase. No more default hybrid etc.

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:9, topic:377255”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473161.msg3460344#msg3460344 date=1294430616]
I think that we will actually get more people. If RuneScape gets more players from the update, more of them will be interested in private servers.
[/quote]
The proportion will remain relatively constant…[/quote]Which is why I’m saying we will get more people?

More RS players = More RSPS players

I guess I phrased this wrong:
“more of them” should be “more people”

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Davidi2:

I think that we will actually get more people. If RuneScape gets more players from the update, more of them will be interested in private servers.

The proportion will remain relatively constant…

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I think alot of people became here not just of the wildy… People have lost accounts and cash, they can’t afored to go back to runescape with all of the bullshit that happens which is why they will stop here. Like me, i came because im bored of runescape, i think others have too which is where they can come here and learn and chill without faggots reporting you for saying somebodys name which is a censor.

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Correct me if I am wrong but I’m pretty sure that this site was made when the wilderness still existed, and was at its peak when it still existed, so I do not think anything will happen. PK’ing is only one of the traits that private servers have.

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

People will still play private servers for the older revision graphics and the smaller community. Jagex may be updating RS so that it will be more like back in 07, but they will never fully return the gameplay to how it was.

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

There is already a thread about this. :[

And tbh i don’t think anything will change besides people going back to playing RS. People will always enjoy RSPS

Read full topic

item.title: What will be of us?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

The only members we will loose are the ones that came here specifically for free trade and pking. I personally came mostly because of the pking being removed, yes, but I am going to stay as I have gained an interest in much more than just RSPS now. It all depends on how well rounded your server is, as to how bad this will effect you.

Read full topic
